summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Blog Carousel feature. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend blog carousel displays correctly with 4 homepage blogs, arrow navigation functional, and 'Ətraflı' buttons navigate properly. Admin panel 'Show on Homepage' toggle confirmed present and functional.

integration_issues.issue: Blog detail pages show loading state instead of full content

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/blogs/homepage returns only blogs with show_on_homepage=true and is_published=true
Backend: Blog create/update accepts show_on_homepage field
Backend: All 18 API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Frontend HomePage: Blog carousel section appears with 4 homepage blogs
Frontend HomePage: Blog carousel has left/right arrow navigation working
Frontend HomePage: 'Ətraflı' button navigates to correct /blog/{slug} URL
Frontend BlogPage: Blog list page loads and displays 5 blog posts correctly
Frontend AdminBlogs: 'Show on Homepage' toggle exists and is functional in admin form
Admin panel login and navigation working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor issue: Blog detail pages show loading state instead of rendering full content. This appears to be a React routing or component loading issue, but does not affect the core blog carousel functionality which is working correctly.
